title: Did a TikTok Video Reveal Recipe Process for Chick-fil-A’s Nuggets?
subtitle: The original viral TikTok video that purportedly showed parts of the recipe for chicken nuggets disappeared, but was re-uploaded by others.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A TikTok video recorded at Chick-fil-A showed the process for creating the fast food restaurant's chicken nuggets.
